word: These young men volunteered to help us from the car with our baggage, and we could only thank them. They may be of that number upon whom the leaven of truth is working. They told us they had to walk twenty miles that night to reach the college which they attend, and it was then about eight o'clock.--Ms 84, 1893, p. 5. ("Labors in New Zealand," Diary, August 15 to 23, 1893.)
